content.question: The French Reign of Terror is most closely associated with the

choices.label: establishment of the Committee of Public Safety
issuance of the Civil Constitution of the Clergy
drafting of the Declaration of the Rights of Man and Citizen
reform of civil and criminal law

content.answer: establishment of the Committee of Public Safety

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
